page.title: 16People
page.content: {The Newsagent}has lived here for 26 years. The changes have been in : shop keepers and shops selling different things and the one way system. A by pass is needed but it will not effect trade.She is the longest serving shop keeper.{The {Potter}was born here as were the two children who spoke to her.She turns her wheel by foot and fires the kiln by oil.The date of her pots can be told by the flowers on them as they bloom when the pot is made.{The {Minister}thinks this is a very nice village, a lovely place to be, right in the forest, super people and a good little school. The by pass is needed. He would like to be remembered as someone who helps.The Bishop sent him! {The Headmaster and DIGGY BADGER}the school mascot wants everyone to {GIVE THEIR BEST...............
